## üéØ YOUR IMMEDIATE NEXT STEPS

### Option 1: Start Learning AI (15 minutes)
```bash
# Open the main guide
open workarea/START-HERE.md

# Then open the dashboard
open workarea/ai-mastery-dashboard.html

# Try your first AI mentor in VS Code Copilot Chat:
@ai-mastery-mentor What should I learn today?
```

### Option 2: Activate First Bot (10 minutes)
```bash
# Read quick start
open bots/QUICK-START.md

# Enable Code Review Bot
mkdir -p .github/workflows
cp bots/workflows/auto-code-review.yml .github/workflows/
git add .github/workflows/
git commit -m "ü§ñ Enable Code Review Bot"
git push

# Watch it work on GitHub Actions tab!
```

### Option 3: See Everything (5 minutes)
```bash
# Open the complete overview
open COMPLETE-SYSTEM-GUIDE.md
```
